text: Allah taâ€™ala ek aur misaal bayaan farmaata hai do shaqso ki jin mein se ek to goonga hai aur kisi cheez par eqtiyaar nahi rakhta balke wo apne maalik par boojh hai, kahi bhi ose bheje wo koyi bhalaayi nahi laata, kya ye aur wo jo adl ka hukm deta hai aur hai bhi sidhi raah par baraabar ho sakte
